kv12.10:1.4_0: Sattamabhaviko puggalo nirayaṁ upapajjeyya, tiracchānayoniṁ upapajjeyya, pettivisayaṁ upapajjeyyāti?
kv12.10:1.6_0: Tena hi sattamabhavikassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti.
kv12.10:2.1_0: Saṁvaro kammaṁ tatheva asaṁvaro, sabbakammaṁ savipākaṁ, saddo vipāko, saḷāyatanaṁ vipāko, sattakkhattuparamo puggalo sattakkhattuparamatāniyato, kolaṅkolapuggalo kolaṅkolatāniyato, ekabījī puggalo ekabījitāniyato, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropeyya, diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, tatheva sattamabhavikassāti.
